page.title: 10RECREATION- CLUBS
page.content:
Monifieth Round Table Youth Club Monifieth Singers Scout Group Monifieth Rotary Club Guide Unit Monifieth 41 Club Boys Brigade Royal British Legion Art Society Senior Citizen Club Ladies Circle Townswomens Guild Over 60s Club Masonic Lodge Eastern Star Army Cadet Force Drama Club St Andrews Ambulance Association __________________
Youth Club At Youth Club we get to play different games.There's badminton, hockey,football,snooker, table tennis, darts and art/crafts.We also do break- dancing.Sometimes we have a disco or visit places.George's mum is one of the leaders.The Club meets in the hall at Seaview.We go for chips afterwards.
